    filter

    filter: mongodb.Filter<TSchema>

    The filter used to determine if a document should be updated. For an updateMany operation, all matches are updated.

    • Defined in node_modules/mongodb/mongodb.d.ts:2513

    Optionalhint

    hint?: Hint

    The index to use. If specified, then the query system will only consider plans using the hinted index.

    • Defined in node_modules/mongodb/mongodb.d.ts:2508

    namespace

    namespace: string

    The namespace for the write.

    A namespace is a combination of the database name and the name of the collection: <database-name>.<collection>. All documents belong to a namespace.

    See

    https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/limits/#std-label-faq-dev-namespace

    Inherited from ClientWriteModel.namespace

    • Defined in node_modules/mongodb/mongodb.d.ts:2590

    update

    update: mongodb.Document[] | UpdateFilter<TSchema>

    The modifications to apply. The value can be either: UpdateFilter - A document that contains update operator expressions, Document[] - an aggregation pipeline.

    • Defined in node_modules/mongodb/mongodb.d.ts:2519

    Optionalupsert

    upsert?: boolean

    When true, creates a new document if no document matches the query.

    • Defined in node_modules/mongodb/mongodb.d.ts:2527
